data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Misiones, Paraguay.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Misiones, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 8,429 believers in Misiones and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary: On average, 17 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Misiones, Paraguay.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Misiones against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Misiones, Paraguay.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Misiones, Paraguay to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Misiones that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Misiones, Paraguay a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
